tool_description: Identifies false cognates and misleading word similarities that result from chance, borrowing, or convergent evolution rather than genetic relationship.

word1.description: First word in potentially misleading pair

word2.description: Second word in potentially misleading pair

error_messages: Insufficient phonological data: Cannot assess false cognate status without adequate phonological analysis.
Language relationship unclear: Need clear information about language family relationships.
Word pair not found: One or both words not found in available databases.
Analysis inconclusive: Available evidence insufficient to determine false cognate status.
usage: Provide two similar-looking words from different languages. The tool evaluates whether the similarity is misleading and warns against false etymological connections.

is_false_friend.description: Whether the word pair represents a false cognate relationship

similarity_type.description: Type of similarity (accidental, borrowing, or genuine cognate)

warning_level.description: Caution level needed when considering these words as related

explanation.description: Explanation of why words are or are not false friends
